<a id="InputEventJoypadButton"></a>

# InputEventJoypadButton

**Inherits:** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a gamepad button being pressed or released.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Input event type for gamepad buttons. For gamepad analog sticks and joysticks, see [InputEventJoypadMotion](InputEventJoypadMotion.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventJoypadButton_property_button_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[JoyButton](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_JoyButton) **button_index** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventJoypadButton_property_button_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_button_index**\ (\ value\: [JoyButton](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_JoyButton)\ )
- [JoyButton](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_JoyButton) **get_button_index**\ (\ )

Button identifier. One of the [JoyButton](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_JoyButton) button constants.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventJoypadButton_property_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventJoypadButton_property_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_pressed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the button's state is pressed. If ``false``, the button's state is released.
